body_html:
Just based on the error message, it appears that your Java binary isn't setup to use the GPU, so it only has CPU kernels registered. While your model requires a GPU and thus can't be loaded.

Is that plausible? If so, could you elaborate on how you're building your Java program? In particular, see the installation instructions for GPU.

Let us know if that helps.
body_text:
Just based on the error message, it appears that your Java binary isn't setup to use the GPU, so it only has CPU kernels registered. While your model requires a GPU and thus can't be loaded.

Let us know if that helps.
body:
Just based on the error message, it appears that your Java binary isn't setup to use the GPU, so it only has CPU kernels registered. While your model requires a GPU and thus can't be loaded.

Is that plausible? If so, could you elaborate on how you're building your Java program? In particular, see [the installation instructions for GPU](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_java#gpu_support).

Let us know if that helps.
